sn47.19:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava sumbhesu viharati sedakam nama sumbhanam nigamo.
sn47.19:1.3: “bhutapubbam, bhikkhave, candalavamsiko candalavamsam ussapetva medakathalikam antevasim amantesi:
sn47.19:1.4: ‘ehi tvam, samma medakathalike, candalavamsam abhiruhitva mama uparikhandhe titthahi’ti.
sn47.19:1.5: ‘Evam, acariya’ti kho, bhikkhave, medakathalika antevasi candalavamsikassa patissutva candalavamsam abhiruhitva acariyassa uparikhandhe atthasi.
sn47.19:1.6: Atha kho, bhikkhave, candalavamsiko medakathalikam antevasim etadavoca:
sn47.19:1.7: ‘tvam, samma medakathalike, mamam rakkha, aham tam rakkhissami.
sn47.19:1.8: Evam mayam annamannam gutta annamannam rakkhita sippani ceva dassessama, labhanca lacchama, sotthina ca candalavamsa orohissama’ti.
sn47.19:1.9: Evam vutte, bhikkhave, medakathalika antevasi candalavamsikam etadavoca:
sn47.19:1.11: Tvam, acariya, attanam rakkha, aham attanam rakkhissami.
sn47.19:1.12: Evam mayam attagutta attarakkhita sippani ceva dassessama, labhanca lacchama, sotthina ca candalavamsa orohissama’”ti.
sn47.19:2.1: “So tattha nayo”ti bhagava etadavoca, “yatha medakathalika antevasi acariyam avoca.
sn47.19:2.4: Attanam, bhikkhave, rakkhanto param rakkhati, param rakkhanto attanam rakkhati.
sn47.19:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, attanam rakkhanto param rakkhati?
sn47.19:3.3: evam kho, bhikkhave, attanam rakkhanto param rakkhati.
sn47.19:3.4: Kathanca, bhikkhave, param rakkhanto attanam rakkhati?
sn47.19:3.6: evam kho, bhikkhave, param rakkhanto attanam rakkhati.
sn47.19:3.9: Attanam, bhikkhave, rakkhanto param rakkhati, param rakkhanto attanam rakkhati”ti.
